prompts: Create a legendary ice-type Pokemon with a sleek, dragon-like design and blue accents.
Show me a mythical creature resembling a giant ice dragon with sharp, icy features.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon with a majestic ice-blue color scheme and glowing elements.
Design an ice-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter and has a fierce expression.
Generate a large Pokemon with dragon-like wings and a frosty appearance, perfect for a snowy environment.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a crystallized dragon with icy blue and black tones.
Make a fierce ice dragon Pokemon with unique glowing patterns across its body.
